Package core

Class Curve2

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.EntityData
      • core.Curve
        • core.Curve2
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IEntityData, IUtils, java.lang.Iterable<Curve2.Knot2>
    public class Curve2
extends Curve
implements java.lang.Iterable<Curve2.Knot2>
    Organizes a Bezier curve into a list of knots. Provides a function to retrieve a point and tangent on a curve from a step in the range [0.0, 1.0].

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  Curve2.Knot2
      Groups together vectors which shape a Bezier curve into a coordinate (or anchor point), fore handle (the following control point) and rear handle (the preceding control point).

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class core.Curve

        Curve.ArcMode

    • Field Summary

        stopAngle - the stop angle

      • random

        public static Curve2 random​(Random rng,
                            int count,
                            float lowerBound,
                            float upperBound,
                            boolean closedLoop,
                            Curve2 target)
        Creates a random curve. Generates random points, creates a curve from those points, then smooths the knots' handles.
        Parameters:
        rng - the random number generator
        count - the number of knots to generate
        lowerBound - the lower bound
        upperBound - the upper bound
        closedLoop - whether the curve is a closed loop
        target - the target curve
        Returns:
        the random curve

      • eval

        public Vec2 eval​(float step,
                 Vec2 coord,
                 Vec2 tangent)
        Evaluates a step in the range [0.0, 1.0], returning a coordinate on the curve and a tangent. The tangent will be normalized, to be of unit length.
        Parameters:
        step - the step
        coord - the output coordinate
        tangent - the output tangent
        Returns:
        the coordinate
        See Also:
        Vec2.bezierPoint(Vec2, Vec2, Vec2, Vec2, float, Vec2), Vec2.bezierTanUnit(Vec2, Vec2, Vec2, Vec2, float, Vec2)

      • evalFirst

        public Vec2 evalFirst​(Vec2 coord,
                      Vec2 tangent)

        Parameters:
        coord - the output coordinate
        tangent - the output tangent
        Returns:
        the coordinate
        See Also:
        Vec2.subNorm(Vec2, Vec2, Vec2)

        Returns:
        the coordinate

      • reverse

        public Curve2 reverse​(Vec2 temp)
        Reverses the curve. This is done by reversing the list of knots and swapping the fore- and rear-handle of each knot.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        this curve
